Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for exploring the glorious city of Madrid!”
Reviews.Author: msr11
Reviews.Content: returned 3 days jardin madrid settling daughter madrid university gone live perfect position 2 mins wak metro links centre 10 mins hotel concierge helpful efficient decor hotel smart spotlessly clean worthy 4 rating superior 5th floor absolutely beautiful furnishings 5 property bed comfortable crisp white linen changed day beautifully designed marble bathroom toiletries including toothbrush hairbrush am critical person comes hotel cause complain jardin suggest opt bed breakfast rate breakfast excellent fresh choices bread fresh fruit strawberries melon kiwis oranges meat cheese fresh omelettes eggs choice diet corner soya milk sugar free european breakfast city time overall strongly recommend hotel city break conveniently situated quiet locationand beautifully maintained enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Business trip”
Reviews.Author: David F
Reviews.Content: 10 mins madrid centre metro station 5 min walk costs 160 euros hotel clean comfortable perfect business trip short city break easy main airport metro change 30 min max travel time free wifi breakfast meant staystaff friendly helpful stay yes

Reviews.Title: “Quality hotel, great value”
Reviews.Author: Claire T
Reviews.Content: recently stayed friends christmas period booked triple huge comfy beds lovely outlook onto street below cleaned daily spotless caused bit mess buying food local supermarket leaving crumbs various staff helpful providing extra wine glasses etc location city centre direct line 1 min walk tube maybe 710 min tube ride plaza del sol direct line museums city parks shopping etc moan tea coffee facilities excellent coffee shop nect door cafe con leche drinks cheaply stay yes

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location Best Staff”
Reviews.Author: ali_o_10
Reviews.Content: stayed adults sons jardin location excellent metro buses infront hotel city metro shops restaurants hotel check fast reception staff friendly smiling time help requests king bed sofa bed beds comfortable clean bath clean soap shampoos towels 3 adults trouble using safe user friendly wifi free slow am madrid stay hotel price location excellent staff cleaniness comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Walls in room are thin - beware”
Reviews.Author: ObservantPerson
Reviews.Content: am particularly light sleeper couldnt sleep person door finished phone call hear movement drawer pulled shoe hitting floor loo roll holder squeaking checked shower reception 1950 restaurant closed answer 2000 tried time reception bar closed 2000 guess time 4 star hotel 3 push piece soap bathroom transparent thin return definately try else

Reviews.Title: “Gets the job done”
Reviews.Author: MontoyaF1
Reviews.Content: chose hotel close church didnt options reviewer didnt feel 4star hotel clean reasonably priced dont smoke reserve nonsmoking assigned smoking changed staff helpful friendly questions requests glad werent annoyed decor throughout hotel looks bit dated bathrooms remodeled balcony windows shut block traffic incredibly insulated unfortunately walls hear neighbors stumbling dinner 1 am

HotelInfo.Name: Jardin Metropolitano
HotelInfo.Address: Avenida Reina Victoria 12, 28003 Madrid, Spain
